name: Flee the Island
description:
After many years of a hard but worthy life on an island, the survivors of a shipwreck were exterminated by some monsters they woke up from the bowels of the cave they were mining.

You are the sole survivor and you must escape!

Explore 15 areas full of puzzles and monsters, and find the way out of the island.

Demo version available: it features the island surface metalevel, with some buildings to explore and some enemy, but no plot.
